title: Kesha cheers up a rainy NYC day in flashy Versace ensemble with quirky white shades
text:
She managed to cheer up a grey and rainy Wednesday in New York City.

Kesha was decked out in a Versace ensemble that was all the colors of the rainbow as she arrived for meetings in New York City.

The 32-year-old hitmaker wore a thigh-length jacket in the brand's signature melee of hues, paisley designs and Chinese motifs. She added to that with a Versace blouse and leggings.

Scroll down for video

Grey day: Kesha cheered up a rainy Wednesday decked out in a Versace ensemble that was all the colors of the rainbow as she arrived for meetings in New York City

Even her block-heeled ankle boots were from the Italian fashion house.

Despite her fun, eye-catching outfit, Kesha, whose full name is Kesha Sebert, kept a straight face as she strolled through the city to her meeting.

She was less colorful when she was spotted jetting out of Los Angeles on Tuesday.

Kesha paired a sky blue hoodie with a pattern of billowing white clouds with comfy leggings for her flight.

Eye-catching: The 32-year-old hitmaker wore a thigh-length jacket in the brand's signature melee of hues, paisley designs and Chinese motifs plus a Versace blouse, leggings and boots

She rounded out her ensemble with shiny blue boots, a black leather fanny pack with silver tassels and a pair of shades with jewel-encrusted rims.

Meanwhile, Kesha is still embroiled in her law suit with producer Lukasz Gottwald, aka Dr. Luke, with whom she collaborated on her biggest hits.

On October 14, 2016, she accused him of abusing her physically, sexually, verbally and emotionally over a 10-year period.

He denied the accusations and sued her for more than $50 million, alleging defamation and breach of contract for failing to create the recordings she owed him under her contract with his label, Kemosabe Records.

The trial date for his suit has not yet been confirmed. But a jury will decide whether she is liable, and if so, how much she might owe Dr. Luke in damages.

Despite this, she is going ahead with her fourth album, she told Billboard last month.

Kesha dished that 'writing the f*** out of some pop songs' would help her deal with the situation.
description: The 32-year-old hitmaker wore a thigh-length jacket in the brand's signature melee of hues, paisley designs and Chinese motifs plus a Versace blouse, leggings and boots in NYC on Wednesday..
